pages.title: Damage
pages.text: Cost: Lv1 = Spell + Magma Block / Lv2 = Spell + Wither Rose $(br2)Max Level: 2$(br2)XP Cost: Lv1 = 4 / Lv2 = 8$(br2)The most basic combat spell at your disposal, fairly easy to craft but powerful

When you cast the spell, a spell projectile will be cast and any entity struck with the projectile will be inflicted with Instant Harm.$(br2)The higher level that the spell is, the more damage the spell will cause to the entity it hits (Does not work on Undead mobs)
